hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.
